title: Privacy
body: Our website does not collect any personal information from you except the files you share. We do not track your IP address or any other identifying information. When you share a file, it is uploaded to our secure servers and a space ID is generated for you to share with others. The files are stored on our servers for the duration of the sharing period, which you can end anytime by clicking "Delete Space" inside the Shared Space. Once the sharing period ends, the file is automatically deleted from our servers and the link to the file is no longer valid. We do not sell or share your personal information with any third-party companies.
